item.title: 'Spooks: The Movie' in the works, says star Peter Firth
item.description: The popular spy drama ended in 2011 after ten series on BBC One

item.title: Baroness' bassist and drummer quit following 2012 bus crash
item.description: Singer reports: 'Some of the effects and injuries were severe enough to prohibit further activity in Baroness'

item.title: 'Alan Partridge' movie will place Steve Coogan's DJ in 'a hostage situation'
item.description: Partridge's first big screen adventure arrives in cinemas on August 7

item.title: Noel Gallagher: 'Performing with Damon Albarn was like John Lennon playing with Eric Clapton'
item.description: Ex-Oasis man also confirms that he won't be curating Teenage Cancer Trust concerts in 2014

item.title: Beyonce announces Twickenham Stadium charity concert
item.description: Superstar will appear alongside Florence + The Machine, Haim, Ellie Goulding and Rita Ora

item.title: Sam Mendes will direct another Bond film, say producers
item.description: Mendes admits he's 'definitely left the door open' to return in the future

item.title: One Direction singer Liam Payne left red faced after cab driver switches off 'One Way Or Another'
item.description: Catalogue of embarrassments continue to mount for boyband

item.title: 'Breaking Bad' script stolen from star Bryan Cranston's car
item.description: A man has been arrested on suspicion of burglary but the script has yet to be recovered

item.title: Will Smith reveals why he turned down Quentin Tarantino's 'Django Unchained'
item.description: Smith said no because he didn't think his role would be the film's lead

item.title: PJ & Duncan's 'Lets Get Ready To Rhumble' is on course to top official UK singles chart
item.description: 1994 single is firm favourite for Number One after shifting over 35,000 copies

item.title: Rihanna delays concert by 90 minutes after her production crew are stopped by border officials
item.description: World tour continues to be dogged by problems on the road

item.title: Phil Spector's wife calls for fresh appeal into his murder case
item.description: Rachelle Spector believes new HBO TV movie clearly proves the producer is innocent

item.title: Billy Corgan commences work on new Smashing Pumpkins album
item.description: The alt.rock band will play three UK arena shows in July

item.title: Play a round of golf with Alice Cooper for $10,000
item.description: The offer is part of a comic book Kickstarter campaign

item.title: Nick Cave And The Bad Seeds, Tame Impala, Local Natives for La Route Du Rock festival
item.description: !!!, Hot Chip, Godspeed You Black Emperor will also play the French festival this August

item.title: Fidlar, Black Stone Cherry, Masters of Reality added to Download Festival bill
item.description: They join previously announced headliners Slipknot, Rammstein and Iron Maiden in Donington Park this June

item.title: Lil Wayne releases new album 'I Am Not A Human Being II'
item.description: The release follows rumours of the rapper's death and his intensive care scare

item.title: 'Game Of Thrones' star attacked after noise dispute in Newcastle
item.description: Clive Mantle has part of his ear bitten off after brutal assault at Travelodge hotel

item.title: Kasabian: 'It isn't possible for guitar music to dominate culture anymore'
item.description: Serge Pizzorno also talks about accidentally revealing that Rolling Stones will headline Glastonbury

item.title: Fall Out Boy reveal new song 'The Phoenix' â€“ listen
item.description: It's the latest track to be taken from band's new album 'Save Rock & Roll'

item.title: Depeche Mode's Dave Gahan: 'My screaming soul floated above me when I died for two minutes'
item.description: Singer opens up about his infamous LA overdose in 1996

item.title: Iggy Pop on Iceage: 'It's not easy to be that dark'
item.description: Iconic frontman approves of their extremely short albums

item.title: Dr Dre: 'Eminem is close to finishing his new album'
item.description: Hip-hop legend also claims studio sessions have inspired him to get back into music

item.title: Man accused of plotting to kill Joss Stone claims he had never heard of her
item.description: Junior Bradshaw tells court he believed he was going on day out

item.title: Ed Sheeran reveals why he snubbed the Noel Gallagher-curated Teenage Cancer Trust concerts
item.description: Singer says he pulled out of headline show because he was already booked to tour Australia
